name: %template matching
description: regexr is quite nice to use ;p
content:
GOOD:
%extends()
%extends(    )
%extends('lol')
%extends(  'lol'   )
%extends('lol.lll')
%extends('lol.lll':'lol.lol')
%extends('lol.lll': 'lol.lol')
%extends('lol.lll','lol.lol.lol')
%extends('lol.lll' : 'lol.lol', 'lol.lol', 'lol.lll' : 'lol.lol' )
%extends('lol.lll' : 'lol.lol',
         'lol.lol',
         'lol.lll' : 'lol.lol' )

BAD:
%extends(')
%extends(,)
%extends('')
%extends('.')
%extends('lol.')
%extends('lol,')
%extends('lol.ll...l')


[^,]
|[^\.]

// first try
%extends\((?:\s*'*(?:[a-zA-Z.]*[^\.])*'*\s*)\)
\(\s*'(?:(?:[a-zA-Z]*[^\.])\.*)'\s*\)

\(\s*(?:'.*',*)*\s*\) => cool base
\(\s*(?:'(?:[a-zA-Z]\.?)*',?:?)*\s*\) => nearly ok, need possible spaces fix

\(\s*(?:'(?:[a-zA-Z0-9]\.?)*'\s*,?:?\s*)*\s*\) => ok, now need to fix those ending with a dot or a

\(\s*(?:'(?:[a-zA-Z0-9]\.?)*[^\.,]'\s*,?:?\s*)*\s*\) => nearly finish ..

\(\s*(?:(?:'(?:[a-zA-Z0-9]\.?)*[^\.,]'\s*,?:?\s*)*|[^\s,'])\s*\) => ok ?
author: StephaneAG
